title: Hot date
creator_credit: Kelly Wallwork, Dennis Tupicoff and Victorian College of the Arts
brief_description: Ingredients; one girl, one boy, and one Mexican cantina. The tale is of one woman’s experience of a date - the anxieties, trials and tribulations of trying to begin a relationship, which must inevitably begin with the first date. It doesn’t always go according to plan.
creator_credit_for_label: Kelly Wallwork, Dennis Tupicoff and Victorian College of the Arts
